agitation_title: Do You Know What This is Costing Your Business?
agitation_subtitle: Every day that passes with mediocre suppliers, your reputation and profits are at risk
agitation_point1_desc: Spoilage from poor quality products is money coming directly out of your pocket. Every rotten avocado, every wilted bunch of cilantro.
agitation_point2_desc: Your customers notice. A bad ingredient ruins the flavor of your dishes and the trust you've worked so hard to build in the community.
agitation_point3_desc: You waste time and energy on calls and complaints, instead of serving your people and growing your business as you deserve.
agitation_box_title: How Much is NOT Having a Reliable Partner Costing You?
agitation_box_desc: While you continue to struggle with mediocre suppliers, your competitors are growing with quality products.
